newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: BES hits record high on profit news.
newsitem.headline: BES hits record high on profit news.

text.p: Shares in Banco Espirito Santo (BES) hit a new record high of 3,100 escudos after the bank said it had raised its 1996 consolidated net profit by 21.3 percent.
The shares were up 101 escudos on volume of 266,960.
Dealers said the profits were better than expected but they did not think the share price would rise much higher.
"It think BES may stick at around 3,100," said one trader.
BES said it would pay a dividend of 131.6 escudos, compared with 114.5 escudos on its 1995 results. It posted a consolidated net profit of 23.59 billion.
